definition: To lose or forfeit something, especially due to careless or excessive behavior, often associated with gambling or games of chance.

examples.german: Er hat sein ganzes Geld verspielt.
examples.english: He has gambled away all his money.

examples.german: Sie haben das Spiel knapp verspielt.
Er verspielt seine Chancen durch sein Verhalten.
examples.english: He squanders his opportunities with his behavior.

examples.german: Sie hat ihre Sympathien bei mir verspielt.
examples.english: She has lost her sympathies with me.

examples.german: Er verspielt seine Zukunft durch seine Faulheit.
examples.english: He is jeopardizing his future with his laziness.
